## SentEthersTransaction class

A transaction that has already been sent.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class SentEthersTransaction<T = unknown> implements SentProtocolTransaction<EthersTransactionResponse, ProtocolReceipt<EthersTransactionReceipt, T>> 
```
**Implements:** [SentProtocolTransaction](./stablecoin-lib-base.sentprotocoltransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;[EthersTransactionResponse](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.etherstransactionresponse.md)<!-- -->, [ProtocolReceipt](./stablecoin-lib-base.protocolreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;[EthersTransactionReceipt](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.etherstransactionreceipt.md)<!-- -->, T&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Returned by [SendableEthers](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.sendableethers.md) functions.

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `SentEthersTransaction` class.
